```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
har <- fread("data/selected_body_part.csv")
har_extracted <- fread("data/extracted_vals.csv")
har_extracted %>%
  count(V271)
har %>%
  count(V46)
```

```{r eda}
har %>%
  group_by(V46) %>%
  mutate(r = row_number()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(r, V1)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~V46, scales = "free")
```
